class_notes: Synchronous class attendance required. Asynchronous assessments. Technology required: webcam, microphone, Google apps.
course_description: The cross-cultural study of traditional markets and exchange patterns, social relations surrounding production, and urban diverse patterns of consumption. Western economic theory contrasted with other approaches to the study of economic customs.
